    • About Kari Kohler


    Kari Kohler’s 10 plus years of successful real estate experience make her an invaluable asset to her clients, and it is her endless energy, work ethic, intuitive nature and grace under pressure that make her the Realtor clients trust and recommend. Kari’s clients appreciate her keen listening skills, detail orientation and gentle take charge personality. She is highly motivated, smart, and customer-centric as she serves St. Charles, Geneva, Batavia, Elgin, Naperville, Barrington and surrounding communities. Kari leads the Kohler Group’s efforts. She works seamlessly together, with her team, to deliver specifically designed results tailored to meet the individual needs of her clients. Kari Kohler is a true professional, and her depth of market knowledge and experience speaks to her $150,000,000 in sales volume. The Kohler Group shares a vision based on dedication to delivering first class service and the results her clients deserve on each and every transaction.

    Kari Kohler
